net.jodah.sarge

Class Sarge

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jodah.sarge.Sarge

  • public class Sarge
extends Object
    Creates supervised objects, with failures being handled according to a Plan.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sarge() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T supervisable(Class<T> type)
      Returns an instance of the type that is capable of being supervised by calling one of the supervise methods.

      Supervises the supervisable object according to the plan.

      Supervises the supervisable object according to the planMaker's plan.

      Supervises the supervisable object with the supervisor's plan, forming a parent-child supervision relationship between the supervisor and supervisable where failures can be escalated.

    • Method Detail

      • supervisable

        public <T> T supervisable(Class<T> type)
        Returns an instance of the type that is capable of being supervised by calling one of the supervise methods.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null
        ProxyException - if there was a failure while proxying the type

      • supervise

        public void supervise(Object supervisable,
             Plan plan)
        Supervises the supervisable object according to the plan.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if supervisable or plan are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if supervised is already supervised

      • supervise

        public void supervise(Object supervisable,
             PlanMaker planMaker)
        Supervises the supervisable object according to the planMaker's plan.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if supervisable or planMaker are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if supervised is already supervised

      • supervise

        public <T extends SelfSupervisor> void supervise(T selfSupervisable)
        Supervises the selfSupervisable object according to its selfPlan.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if selfSupervised is null

      • supervise

        public <T extends Supervisor> void supervise(Object supervisable,
                                    T supervisor)
        Supervises the supervisable object with the supervisor's plan, forming a parent-child supervision relationship between the supervisor and supervisable where failures can be escalated.

        Any self-supervision for the supervisable is overriden.

        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if supervised or supervisor are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if supervisable is already supervised

      • supervised

        public <C,S extends Supervisor> C supervised(Class<C> type,
                                    S supervisor)
        Returns an instance of the type that is supervised by the supervisor's plan, forming a parent-child supervision relationship between the supervisor and the result where failures can be escalated.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type or supervisor are null
        ProxyException - if there was a failure while proxying the type

      • supervised

        public <T extends SelfSupervisor> T supervised(Class<T> selfSupervisable)
        Returns an instance of the selfSupervisable that is supervised by the by the selfSupervisable's selfPlan.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if selfSupervisable is null
        ProxyException - if there was a failure while proxying the selfSupervisable

      • supervised

        public <T> T supervised(Class<T> type,
               Plan plan)
        Returns an instance of the type that is supervised by the plan.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if supervisedType or plan are null
        ProxyException - if there was a failure while proxying the type

      • supervised

        public <T> T supervised(Class<T> type,
               PlanMaker planMaker)
        Returns an instance of the type that is supervised by the planMaker's plan.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type or planMaker are null
        ProxyException - if there was a failure while proxying the type

      • unsupervise

        public void unsupervise(Object supervised)
        Unsupervises the supervised object.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if supervised is null
        IllegalStateException - if supervised is not supervised
